displayName.english: The old windmill may still be spinning.

displayName.turkish: Eski yel değirmeni hâlâ dönüyor olabilir.

description.english: Find all spear pieces, restore and reassemble.
description.french: Trouvez tous les morceaux de lance, restaurez et réassemblez.
description.german: Alle Speerstücke finden, restaurieren und wieder zusammensetzen.
description.italian: Trova tutti i pezzi di lancia, ripristina e rimonta.
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie włócznie, przywróć i złóż ponownie.
description.portuguese: Encontre todas as peças de lança, restaure e monte novamente.
description.russian: Найти все части копья, восстановить и собрать.
description.schinese: 找到所有长矛碎片，恢复并重新组装。

description.turkish: Tüm mızrak parçalarını bulun, geri yükleyin ve yeniden birleştirin.

description.english: Rebuild the Roman Crane.
description.french: Reconstruisez la grue romaine.
description.german: Baue den römischen Kran wieder auf.
description.italian: Ricostruisci la gru romana.
description.polish: Odbuduj rzymski żuraw.
description.portuguese: Reconstrua a Garça Romana.
description.russian: Восстановите римский кран.
description.schinese: 重建罗马起重机。
description.spanish: Reconstruye la grúa romana.
description.tchinese: 重建羅馬起重機。
description.turkish: Roma Turnasını yeniden inşa et.

displayName.english: Support to the power of Rome.

description.english: Order the parts and build a wooden cantilever.
description.french: Commandez les pièces et construisez un porte-à-faux en bois.
description.german: Bestelle die Teile und baue einen Holzausleger.
description.italian: Ordina le parti e costruisci un cantilever in legno.
description.polish: Zamów części i zbuduj drewniany wspornik.
description.portuguese: Peça as peças e construa um balanço de madeira.
description.russian: Закажите детали и соберите деревянную консоль.
description.schinese: 订购零件并建造一个木制悬臂。
description.spanish: Ordena las piezas y construye un voladizo de madera.
description.tchinese: 訂購零件並建造一個木製懸臂。
description.turkish: Parçaları sipariş edin ve ahşap bir konsol inşa edin.

description.english: Find a metal bottle and renew.
description.french: Trouvez une bouteille en métal et renouvelez.
description.german: Finde eine Metallflasche und erneuere sie.
description.italian: Trova una bottiglia di metallo e rinnovala.
description.polish: Znajdź metalową butelkę i wymień.
description.portuguese: Encontre uma garrafa de metal e renove.
description.russian: Найти металлическую бутылку и обновить.
description.schinese: 找一个金属瓶并更新。
description.spanish: Encuentra una botella de metal y renueva.
description.tchinese: 找一個金屬瓶並更新。
description.turkish: Metal bir şişe bul ve yenile.

description.english: Find and rebuild a wooden barrel.
description.french: Trouvez et reconstruisez un tonneau en bois.
description.german: Finde ein Holzfass und baue es wieder auf.
description.italian: Trova e ricostruisci una botte di legno.
description.polish: Znajdź i odbuduj drewnianą beczkę.
description.portuguese: Encontre e reconstrua um barril de madeira.
description.russian: Найти и восстановить деревянную бочку.
description.schinese: 找到并重建一个木桶。
description.spanish: Encuentra y reconstruye un barril de madera.
description.tchinese: 找到並重建一個木桶。
description.turkish: Tahta bir fıçı bulun ve yeniden oluşturun.

displayName.french: Ancien conteneur à céréales en bois.
displayName.italian: Vecchio contenitore per cereali in legno.
displayName.portuguese: Recipiente de grãos de madeira antigo.
displayName.spanish: Contenedor de grano antiguo de madera.

description.english: Collect the pieces and rebuild the container.
description.french: Récupérez les pièces et reconstruisez le conteneur.
description.german: Sammle die Teile und baue den Container wieder auf.
description.italian: Raccogli i pezzi e ricostruisci il contenitore.
description.polish: Zbierz części i przebuduj kontener.
description.portuguese: Recolha as peças e reconstrua o contêiner.
description.russian: Собери осколки и перестрой контейнер.
description.schinese: 收集碎片并重建容器。
description.spanish: Recoge las piezas y reconstruye el contenedor.
description.tchinese: 收集碎片並重建容器。
description.turkish: Parçaları topla ve kabı yeniden oluştur.

description.english: Find the pieces of the bell and rebuild the bell.
description.french: Trouvez les morceaux de la cloche et reconstruisez la cloche.
description.german: Finde die Teile der Glocke und baue die Glocke wieder auf.
description.italian: Trova i pezzi della campana e ricostruisci la campana.
description.polish: Znajdź kawałki dzwonu i odbuduj dzwon.
description.portuguese: Encontre as peças do sino e reconstrua o sino.
description.russian: Найди части колокола и восстанови его.
description.schinese: 找到钟的碎片并重建钟。
description.spanish: Encuentra las piezas de la campana y reconstruye la campana.
description.tchinese: 找到鐘的碎片並重建鐘。
description.turkish: Zilin parçalarını bulun ve zili yeniden oluşturun.

description.english: Place your books in a place that is visible to visitors.
description.french: Placez vos livres dans un endroit visible pour les visiteurs.
description.german: Platzieren Sie Ihre Bücher an einem Ort, der für Besucher sichtbar ist.
description.italian: Posiziona i tuoi libri in un luogo visibile ai visitatori.
description.polish: Umieść swoje książki w miejscu widocznym dla odwiedzających.
description.portuguese: Coloque seus livros em um local visível para os visitantes.
description.russian: Разместите свои книги на видном для посетителей месте.
description.schinese: 将您的书籍放在访客可以看到的地方。
description.spanish: Coloca tus libros en un lugar visible para los visitantes.
description.tchinese: 將您的書籍放在訪客可以看到的地方。
description.turkish: Kitaplarınızı ziyaretçilerin görebileceği bir yere yerleştirin.

description.english: Find the pieces of the sculpture and rebuild the whole thing.
description.french: Trouvez les morceaux de la sculpture et reconstruisez le tout.
description.german: Finden Sie die Teile der Skulptur und bauen Sie das Ganze wieder auf.
description.italian: Trova i pezzi della scultura e ricostruisci il tutto.
description.polish: Znajdź fragmenty rzeźby i odbuduj całość.
description.portuguese: Encontre as peças da escultura e reconstrua tudo.
description.russian: Найдите части скульптуры и восстановите ее целиком.
description.schinese: 找到雕塑的碎片并重建整个东西。
description.spanish: Encuentra las piezas de la escultura y reconstruye todo.
description.tchinese: 找到雕塑的碎片並重建整個東西。
description.turkish: Heykelin parçalarını bul ve her şeyi yeniden inşa et.

description.english: Find pieces of a buffalo carving. Place restored sculptures in their places.
description.french: Trouvez des morceaux d'une sculpture de buffle. Placez les sculptures restaurées à leur place.
description.german: Finden Sie Teile einer Büffelschnitzerei. Stellen Sie restaurierte Skulpturen an ihren Platz.
description.italian: Trova i pezzi di una scultura di bufalo. Metti le sculture restaurate al loro posto.
description.polish: Znajdź fragmenty rzeźby bawolego. Umieść odrestaurowane rzeźby na ich miejscach.
description.portuguese: Encontre pedaços de uma escultura de búfalo. Coloque esculturas restauradas em seus lugares.
description.russian: Найди фрагменты резьбы по фигуре буйвола. Расставь отреставрированные скульптуры на их места.
description.schinese: 找到水牛雕刻的碎片。将修复后的雕塑放在它们的位置上。
description.spanish: Encuentra piezas de una talla de búfalo. Coloca las esculturas restauradas en su lugar.
description.tchinese: 找到水牛雕刻的碎片。將修復後的雕塑放在它們的位置上。
description.turkish: Bir bufalo oymasının parçalarını bulun. Restore edilmiş heykelleri yerlerine yerleştirin.

description.english: Clear the tower.
description.french: Dégagez la tour.
description.german: Räumen Sie den Turm auf.
description.italian: Cancella la torre.
description.polish: Oczyść wieżę.
description.portuguese: Limpe a torre.
description.russian: Очистить башню.
description.schinese: 清理塔楼。
description.spanish: Despeja la torre.
description.tchinese: 清理塔樓。
description.turkish: Kuleyi temizleyin.

description.english: Cleanse the stone lions.
description.french: Nettoyez les lions de pierre.
description.german: Säubere die Steinlöwen.
description.italian: Purifica i leoni di pietra.
description.polish: Oczyść kamienne lwy.
description.portuguese: Limpe os leões de pedra.
description.russian: Очистить каменных львов.
description.schinese: 清理石狮。
description.spanish: Limpia los leones de piedra.
description.tchinese: 清理石獅。
description.turkish: Taş aslanları temizleyin.

description.english: Put the stone cupids in their place.
description.french: Remettez les amours de pierre à leur place.
description.german: Setzen Sie die Steinamoren an ihren Platz.
description.italian: Metti gli amorini di pietra al loro posto.
description.polish: Postaw kamienne amorki na ich miejscu.
description.portuguese: Coloque os cupidos de pedra em seu lugar.
description.russian: Поставьте каменных купидонов на место.
description.schinese: 把石头丘比特放在他们的位置上。
description.spanish: Pon los cupidos de piedra en su lugar.
description.tchinese: 把石頭丘比特放在他們的位置上。
description.turkish: Taş aşk tanrılarını yerlerine koyun.

description.english: Rebuild the old clock from the pieces.
description.french: Reconstruisez l'ancienne horloge à partir des pièces.
description.german: Baue die alte Uhr aus den Teilen wieder auf.
description.italian: Ricostruisci il vecchio orologio dai pezzi.
description.polish: Odbuduj stary zegar z kawałków.
description.portuguese: Reconstrua o relógio antigo com as peças.
description.russian: Соберите старые часы из кусочков.
description.schinese: 从碎片中重建旧时钟。
description.spanish: Reconstruye el viejo reloj con las piezas.
description.tchinese: 從碎片中重建舊時鐘。
description.turkish: Eski saati parçalardan yeniden oluşturun.

description.english: Rebuild the Seismograph.
description.french: Reconstruisez le sismographe.
description.german: Baue den Seismographen wieder auf.
description.italian: Ricostruisci il sismografo.
description.polish: Odbuduj sejsmograf.
description.portuguese: Reconstrua o sismógrafo.
description.russian: Перестроить сейсмограф.
description.schinese: 重建地震仪。
description.spanish: Reconstruye el sismógrafo.
description.tchinese: 重建地震儀。
description.turkish: Sismografı yeniden oluşturun.

description.english: Clear the sculpture.
description.french: Effacez la sculpture.
description.german: Entferne die Skulptur.
description.italian: Cancella la scultura.
description.polish: Wyczyść rzeźbę.
description.portuguese: Limpe a escultura.
description.russian: Очистить скульптуру.
description.schinese: 清除雕塑。
description.spanish: Despeja la escultura.
description.tchinese: 清除雕塑。
description.turkish: Heykeli temizleyin.

description.english: Place the folded sculptures on the cathedral's roof.
description.french: Placez les sculptures pliées sur le toit de la cathédrale.
description.german: Stellen Sie die gefalteten Skulpturen auf das Dach der Kathedrale.
description.italian: Posiziona le sculture piegate sul tetto della cattedrale.
description.polish: Umieść złożone rzeźby na dachu katedry.
description.portuguese: Coloque as esculturas dobradas no telhado da catedral.
description.russian: Поместите сложенные скульптуры на крышу собора.
description.schinese: 将折叠的雕塑放在大教堂的屋顶上。
description.spanish: Coloca las esculturas dobladas en el techo de la catedral.
description.tchinese: 將折疊的雕塑放在大教堂的屋頂上。
